css_value: body.maxi-blocks--active #column-maxi-04db6e99-u{box-shadow:0px 0px 0px 0px rgba(var(--maxi-dark-color-8,9,60,88),1);width:100%;flex-basis:100%;min-width:initial;flex-direction:column;}body.maxi-blocks--active #column-maxi-04db6e99-u > .maxi-background-displayer{border-top-right-radius:30px;border-bottom-right-radius:30px;}@media only screen and (min-width:1921px){body.maxi-blocks--active #column-maxi-04db6e99-u > .maxi-background-displayer{border-top-right-radius:20px;border-bottom-right-radius:20px;}}@media only screen and (max-width:767px){body.maxi-blocks--active #column-maxi-04db6e99-u{width:calc(50% - 1.25%);flex-basis:calc(50% - 1.25%);}}@media only screen and (max-width:480px){body.maxi-blocks--active #column-maxi-04db6e99-u{width:100%;flex-basis:100%;}}
